bug.author: kadzaki
bug.description:
Hi! I'am getting the error in the image while trying to install, i'am installing via terminal System:
OS: Windows using Anaconda CPU only Haystack version (commit or version number): latest
â”†Issue is synchronized with this <denchmark-link:https://deepset-ai.atlassian.net/browse/HS-27>Jira Task</denchmark-link> by <denchmark-link:https://www.unito.io/learn-more>Unito</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kadzaki>@kadzaki</denchmark-link> , the issue was on the FARM side and should have been resolved with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/issues/489>#489</denchmark-link> . Since a new FARM version isn't yet released, could you try installing FARM + Haystack from the source? <denchmark-h:h3>Installation from source</denchmark-h>
Install FARM from source: git clone https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM.git && cd FARM && pip install -e . Clone Haystack: git clone https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack.git Remove farm from Haystack's requirements.txt file Run pip install -e . from inside the Haystack directory
Happy to help if you face any issues in getting this to work.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kadzaki>@kadzaki</denchmark-link> I believe this is now resolved. Feel free to update here if you still face the issue.
